results.text: And the prayer offered in faith will make the sick person well; the Lord will raise them up. If they have sinned, they will be forgiven.
results.reason: Emphasizes the power of prayer and faith in bringing about healing.
results.reflection: Believing in the power of prayer can bring healing and forgiveness.

results.text: But he was pierced for our transgressions, he was crushed for our iniquities; the punishment that brought us peace was on him, and by his wounds we are healed.
results.reason: Points to the atoning sacrifice of Jesus as bringing spiritual and physical healing.
results.reflection: Through Jesus' sacrifice, we find healing and peace.

results.text: Jesus went throughout Galilee, teaching in their synagogues, proclaiming the good news of the kingdom, and healing every disease and sickness among the people.
results.reason: Illustrates Jesus' ministry of physical healing as an expression of the kingdom of God.
results.reflection: Jesus' healing miracles reveal the power and compassion of God's kingdom.

results.text: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.
results.reason: A prayer for healing and salvation, acknowledging God as the source of both.
results.reflection: Turning to God in prayer for healing and salvation brings praise to Him.
